parameters.name: StyleFile
parameters.description: Full pathname of the file containing line styles to get

parameters.description: Array of strings containing line style names

parameters.name: StyleList
parameters.description: Array of strings containing line style types

title: ISldWorks.GetLineStyles
description: Gets all of the line styles in the specified file.
signature:
System.Boolean GetLineStyles( 
   System.String
StyleFile
,
   out System.Object
StyleNameList
,
   out System.Object
StyleList
)

parameters.name: StyleFile
parameters.description: Full pathname of the file containing line styles to get

parameters.name: StyleNameList
parameters.description: Array of strings containing line style names

parameters.name: StyleList
parameters.description: Array of strings containing line style types

returns: True if successful, false if not
